channel.title: Server Of The Month (APRIL)
channel.description:
Ok I Am Aware This Has Been Posted Before But That Was For The Best Server Of The Year 2007. I Now Wish To Do Server Of The Month Every Month To See Which Becomes The Best Server
THIS IS FOR APRIL
Ok The Servers Are In A Poll But I Will Add Some Additional Ones Here.
[size=20pt]Rules:[/size] + Vote Fairly +You May Only Select 2 +No Spamming This Thread +Have Fun.
Server Advertismnent Layout Rules When Posting Your Entry But I Will Add Some That I Have Played So Check First
[code]Code: [b]Server Name : [/b] [i] Server Name [/i] [b]Server IP : [/b] [i] Server IP [/i] [b]Server Port : [/b] [i] Server Port [/i] [b]Hamachi : [/b] [i] Yes/No (If yes provide details) [/i] [b]Server Thread Link :[/b] [i] (Thread link) [/i] Rules [/code]
1. Follow all the main rules of MoparScape.org found At http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html]
2. Don't use this topic for advertisement only, you will be reported to an Administrator/Moderator for this and you're server will be removed/not added to the poll.
3. Limit you're server details to that of what's shown in the layout chapter, don't post you're life story.
4. Use the layout, if you don't, I will ignore you and will not add you're server to the poll.
How to enter
To enter you're server into the woods, simply post you're server name and details if you wish.
Thankyou.
Added Servers So Far.
PkeRscape xlinescape ReaperIsle SatanScape
PLEASE POST IF YOU WANT YOUR SERVER HERE MODS PLEASE DONT LOCK THIS IF IT IS WRONG TELL ME AND I WILL EDIT IT

item.title: Server Of The Month (APRIL)
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

.Kaboom (The Wise Guy):

Rofl… I wish there was a code to fix up noobs

I have one, it would just be a shame to see you go.

But i dont really play private servers/involved much in them.
But Zdiddyscape is heard is good, and it quite good for the 3mins i played on it for lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@Master_Of_PK wrote:

Ok I Am Aware This Has Been Posted Before But That Was For The Best Server Of The Year 2007.
I Now Wish To Do Server Of The Month Every Month To See Which Becomes The Best Server

THIS IS FOR APRIL

Ok The Servers Are In A Poll But I Will Add Some Additional Ones Here.

                                                  [size=20pt]Rules:[/size]
  • Vote Fairly
    +You May Only Select 2
    +No Spamming This Thread
    +Have Fun.

Server Advertismnent Layout Rules When Posting Your Entry But I Will Add Some That I Have Played So Check First

Code: [b]Server Name : [/b] [i] Server Name [/i] [b]Server IP : [/b] [i] Server IP [/i] [b]Server Port : [/b] [i] Server Port [/i] [b]Hamachi : [/b] [i] Yes/No (If yes provide details) [/i] [b]Server Thread Link :[/b] [i] (Thread link) [/i] Rules

  1. Follow all the main rules of MoparScape.org found At http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html]

  3. Limit you’re server details to that of what’s shown in the layout chapter, don’t post you’re life story.

  4. Use the layout, if you don’t, I will ignore you and will not add you’re server to the poll.

How to enter

To enter you’re server into the woods, simply post you’re server name and details if you wish.

Thankyou.
